name: Vogue Portugal x Decentral Art Pavilion

metadata.name: "Iconic" cover by Vogue Portugal, October 2017
metadata.description: This "Iconic" cover by Vogue Portugal, published October 2017, is one of the first three by the title under the helm of LightHouse Publishing. The trio of covers marks the relaunch of Vogue in Portugal under a new creative direction that would forever change the perception of Vogue Portugal in the world. Under the vision of Editor in Chief Sofia Lucas and Cover Art Director Jos√© Santana, model Maria Borges is photographed by Branislav Simoncik.
